locksmith:Key.NAME: Key
locksmith:Key.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

locksmith:KeyMove.NAME: Key Move
locksmith:KeyMove.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Add 1 *Key into your hand.

locksmith:JingleLoan.NAME: Jingle Loan
locksmith:JingleLoan.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add !M! *Keys into your hand. NL Exhaust.
locksmith:JingleLoan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add !M! *Keys into your hand. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

locksmith:Keysmack.NAME: Keysmack
locksmith:Keysmack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 *Key into your hand.

locksmith:KeychainRain.NAME: Keychain Rain
locksmith:KeychainRain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your hand contains 3 or more *Keys, deal !D! damage again.

locksmith:ExplodingDummy.NAME: Exploding Dummy
locksmith:ExplodingDummy.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Dummy with !M! HP. NL If it dies, it deals !todo! damage to ALL non-Dummy enemies.

locksmith:StrengthDummy.NAME: Strength Dummy
locksmith:StrengthDummy.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Dummy with !M! HP. NL If it dies, you gain !todo! Strength.

locksmith:AngerKey.NAME: Key To Rage
locksmith:AngerKey.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! Strength. NL Add 1 *Key into your hand.

locksmith:Anime.NAME: Anime
locksmith:Anime.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 *Key into your hand. NL *Keys in your hand become *Keyblades with !M! bonus damage.

locksmith:PuppetGuard.NAME: Puppet Guard
locksmith:PuppetGuard.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Dummy with 6 HP. NL If it dies, it grants you !M! Block.

locksmith:DummyRevenge.NAME: Dummy's Revenge
locksmith:DummyRevenge.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Dummy with 10 HP. NL At the end of your turn, each Dummy makes a random enemy lose !M! HP.

locksmith:Voodoo.NAME: Voodoomy
locksmith:Voodoo.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Dummy with !M! HP. NL If it dies, so do ALL enemies.

locksmith:DeathGaze.NAME: Death Glare
locksmith:DeathGaze.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! locksmith:Hexx to ALL locksmith:Crippled enemies.

locksmith:BuriedCurse.NAME: Buried Curse
locksmith:BuriedCurse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

locksmith:SappingKeys.NAME: Sapping Keys
locksmith:SappingKeys.DESCRIPTION: *Keys make their targets lose 1 Strength this turn.
locksmith:SappingKeys.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Keys make their targets lose 1 Strength this turn. NL Add 1 *Key into your hand.

locksmith:LockSmack.NAME: Lock Smack
locksmith:LockSmack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL locksmith:Lock the top card of your draw pile.

locksmith:DrainingFog.NAME: Draining Miasma
locksmith:DrainingFog.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

locksmith:SkeletonKey.NAME: Skeleton Key
locksmith:SkeletonKey.DESCRIPTION: Add 5 *Keys into your hand. NL Exhaust.

locksmith:PowerSap.NAME: Power Sap
locksmith:PowerSap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is locksmith:Crippled, they lose 1 Strength and you gain 1 Strength.

locksmith:BolsteringKeys.NAME: Boosting Keys
locksmith:BolsteringKeys.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a *Key, gain 1 Strength that turn.
locksmith:BolsteringKeys.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a *Key, gain 1 Strength that turn. NL Add 1 *Key into your hand.

locksmith:SmackSmackBurn.NAME: Smack Smack Burn
locksmith:SmackSmackBurn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !sddy! damage. NL Exhaust 1 card.

locksmith:BlockAndKey.NAME: Block And Key
locksmith:BlockAndKey.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 *Key into your hand.

locksmith:CursedKey.NAME: Cursed Key
locksmith:CursedKey.DESCRIPTION: Counts as a *Key. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Exhausted, apply !M! locksmith:Hexx to ALL enemies.

locksmith:Capitalize.NAME: Capitalize
locksmith:Capitalize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is locksmith:Crippled, locksmith:Equalize.

locksmith:CripplingDummy.NAME: Crippling Fake
locksmith:CripplingDummy.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Dummy with !M! HP. NL If it dies, it applies !todo! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

locksmith:DoubleKey.NAME: Double Key
locksmith:DoubleKey.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Counts as a *Key. NL If this card is Exhausted, add 1 *Key into your hand.
locksmith:DoubleKey.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Counts as a *Key. NL If this card is Exhausted, add 1 *Double *Key into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This card may not be played.

locksmith:ZaHando.NAME: Za Hando
locksmith:ZaHando.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust the middle card(s) of your hand.

locksmith:EvilKeys.NAME: Boosting Keys
locksmith:EvilKeys.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a *Key, gain 1 Strength until the end of your turn.

locksmith:PocketKey.NAME: Pocket Key
locksmith:PocketKey.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength this turn. NL Add 1 *Key into your hand.

locksmith:GolfGash.NAME: Golf Gash
locksmith:GolfGash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each enemy in combat.

locksmith:TheLock.NAME: The Lock
locksmith:TheLock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL locksmith:Lock your hand.

locksmith:Prep.NAME: Prep
locksmith:Prep.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 *Key into your hand. NL locksmith:Equalize.
locksmith:Prep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 1 *Key into your hand. NL locksmith:Equalize twice.

locksmith:TrashToTreasure.NAME: Trash To Treasure
locksmith:TrashToTreasure.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! locksmith:Hexx. NL If the enemy is locksmith:Crippled, apply !M! locksmith:Hexx again.

locksmith:HexingDummy.NAME: Mirror Magic
locksmith:HexingDummy.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Dummy with !M! HP. NL Whenever it loses HP, all non-Dummy enemies gain that much locksmith:Hexx.

locksmith:SliceSlash.NAME: Slice Slash
locksmith:SliceSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deal !sddy! damage to ALL enemies.

locksmith:Recharge.NAME: Rejuvenation
locksmith:Recharge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you have no *Keys, add 2 *Keys into your hand.

locksmith:BlockBurnDraw.NAME: Block Burn Draw
locksmith:BlockBurnDraw.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust 1 card at random. NL Draw 2 cards.
locksmith:BlockBurnDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Draw 2 cards.

locksmith:DarkBurst.NAME: Dark Burst
locksmith:DarkBurst.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Trigger all locksmith:Hexx.
locksmith:DarkBurst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Trigger all locksmith:Hexx twice.

locksmith:StormOfShpiel.NAME: Storm of Shpiel
locksmith:StormOfShpiel.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL ALL enemies lose 1 Strength for each card Exhausted.

locksmith:DeadlyReversal.NAME: Deadly Reversal
locksmith:DeadlyReversal.DESCRIPTION: Play your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

locksmith:InfiniteKeys.NAME: Infinite Keys
locksmith:InfiniteKeys.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Key into your hand.
locksmith:InfiniteKeys.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a *Key into your hand.

locksmith:SlowSapping.NAME: Slow Sapping
locksmith:SlowSapping.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! locksmith:Hexx to ALL non-Dummy enemies and gain !M! Temporary_HP.

locksmith:ShieldingDummy.NAME: Shielding Dummy
locksmith:ShieldingDummy.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Dummy with !M! HP. NL Whenever it loses HP, gain that much Block.

locksmith:Exploit.NAME: Exploit
locksmith:Exploit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is locksmith:Crippled, gain [E] [E] [E] .

locksmith:Absorb.NAME: Absorb
locksmith:Absorb.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Dummy with 10 HP. NL Whenever an enemy dies, gain 1 Strength.
locksmith:Absorb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Summon a Dummy with 10 HP. NL Whenever an enemy dies, gain 1 Strength.

locksmith:DDummy.NAME: D-Dummy!
locksmith:DDummy.DESCRIPTION: Dummies attack you for 1 damage. NL Whenever a Dummy dies, gain !M! Block.

locksmith:Tsundere.NAME: Tsundere
locksmith:Tsundere.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills a Dummy, apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

locksmith:WarudoDummy.NAME: DIO Dummy
locksmith:WarudoDummy.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Dummy with !M! HP. NL If it dies, take an extra turn. NL Exhaust.
locksmith:WarudoDummy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a Dummy with !M! HP. NL If it dies, take an extra turn. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

locksmith:DarkMagic.NAME: Dark Magic
locksmith:DarkMagic.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! locksmith:Hexx. NL Apply !todo! Weak. NL Apply !todo! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.
locksmith:DarkMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! locksmith:Hexx. NL Apply !todo! Weak. NL Apply !todo! Vulnerable. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

locksmith:SoulSucker.NAME: Soul Sucker
locksmith:SoulSucker.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, trigger the locksmith:Hexx of locksmith:Crippled enemies.
locksmith:SoulSucker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, trigger the locksmith:Hexx of locksmith:Crippled enemies. NL Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

locksmith:InsidiousPower.NAME: Insidious Power
locksmith:InsidiousPower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 locksmith:Hexx and [E] .
locksmith:InsidiousPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain 1 locksmith:Hexx and [E] .

locksmith:Harvest.NAME: Harvest
locksmith:Harvest.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your draw pile and remove it. NL Summon a Dummy with 10 HP. NL If it dies, play that card.

locksmith:ItWasAJoke.NAME: "I Was Merely Fooling"
locksmith:ItWasAJoke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, it revives with full HP.

locksmith:Grab.NAME: Grab
locksmith:Grab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL If this kills an enemy, add 1 *Key into your hand.

locksmith:HitDrawBurnBlockHitBlockDrawBu.NAME: Hit Draw Burn Block Hit Block Draw Burn Hit Burn Draw Block
locksmith:HitDrawBurnBlockHitBlockDrawBu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust 1 card. Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. Exhaust 1 card. NL Deal !D! damage. Exhaust 1 card. NL Draw !M! cards. Gain !B! Block.

locksmith:Unearth.NAME: Unearth
locksmith:Unearth.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your exhaust pile. NL Play the chosen card and Exhaust it. NL Exhaust.
locksmith:Unearth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your exhaust pile. NL Play the chosen card and Exhaust it. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

locksmith:FeelNoFeign.NAME: Feel No Feign
locksmith:FeelNoFeign.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain !M! Block next turn.

locksmith:Burden.NAME: Burden
locksmith:Burden.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted this turn, gain 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

locksmith:AoeMultiAttackPlusAKey.NAME: AOE Multi Attack + Key
locksmith:AoeMultiAttackPlusAKey.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 3 times. NL Add 1 *Key into your hand.

locksmith:GoAway.NAME: Go Away
locksmith:GoAway.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

locksmith:SlamCrush.NAME: Slam Crush
locksmith:SlamCrush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is locksmith:Crippled, apply !M! locksmith:Hexx instead.

locksmith:WaveOfRudeness.NAME: Wave Of Rudeness
locksmith:WaveOfRudeness.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! locksmith:Hexx and !todo! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

locksmith:GreaterEvil.NAME: Greater Evil
locksmith:GreaterEvil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL locksmith:Equalize !M! times. NL Exhaust.

locksmith:Horrify.NAME: Horrify
locksmith:Horrify.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! locksmith:Hexx to ALL locksmith:Crippled enemies. NL locksmith:Equalize ALL enemies.

locksmith:ValueDummy.NAME: Value Select
locksmith:ValueDummy.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Dummy with 10 HP. NL If it dies, draw !M! card and gain [E] .
locksmith:ValueDummy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a Dummy with 10 HP. NL If it dies, draw !M! cards and gain [E] [E] .

locksmith:TrueEvil.NAME: Enigma
locksmith:TrueEvil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Kill ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

locksmith:HitBurnDrawBurnBlockBurn.NAME: HitBurnDrawBurnBlockBurn
locksmith:HitBurnDrawBurnBlockBurn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust 1 card.

locksmith:TrashSlam.NAME: Trash Smash
locksmith:TrashSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is increased by !M! for each card in your exhaust pile.

locksmith:LockedGuard.NAME: Unlock!
locksmith:LockedGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card.
locksmith:LockedGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards.

locksmith:Influx.NAME: Influx
locksmith:Influx.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add !M! *Shitty *Keys into your hand.

locksmith:ShittyKey.NAME: Shitty Key
locksmith:ShittyKey.DESCRIPTION: counts as key. NL etheral. NL del !D! Damge. NL exaust

locksmith:FriendlyGift.NAME: Friendly Gift
locksmith:FriendlyGift.DESCRIPTION: Give the enemy !M! Temporary_HP. NL If they die, add 3 *Keys into your hand.
